title: Farewell, Japan 😭
summary: My final day in Japan will be bittersweet. I'm planning to savor every moment - a peaceful morning at a local market, some last-minute souvenir shopping, and one final Japanese meal. I know I'll be emotional leaving, but I'm already excited to start planning my next visit!

activities.description: Departure with a heart full of anticipation

images.caption: 🌅 Final morning at Kyoto's local market

highlight: Collecting all these amazing memories and experiences. I know this trip will be life-changing! Arigato gozaimasu, Japan! 🙏
